articles.author: Filip Timotija
articles.title: DOGE team defends federal layoffs: ‘Almost no one has gotten fired’ - The Hill
articles.description: President Trump’s senior adviser and tech billionaire Elon Musk, along with seven Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) staffers, defended the number of federal government employees the advisory board has moved to terminate in recent months, arguing that…
